page.title: 06LEISURE and ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: We interviewed fifteen people in Spixworth and Frettenham.We asked them what they do in their spare time. Fourteen people{read a book},fifteen people{watched television}and fourteen people often go for a{walk}.Twelve people go for a{drink},fifteen people enjoy{gardening}and four people often go to the{cinema}.Nine people often go to the{theatre},three people go to a live{football match}and four people use a{computer}.Eight people do {knitting,}ten people do{needle work and nine people go{bird watching. Three people do{art}and twelve people listen to{tapes or records}.Ten people said that they take their wife or husband out,but most of the women said that their husbands usually take them out.
